title: We judging it requisite for the better government of His Majesties army, and the preservation of the peace of this kingdom, that all officers and souldiers under their command, should be, and continue in their respective garrisons ... by the Lord Lieutenant General and General Governour of Ireland, Ormonde.
author: Ireland. Lord Lieutenant (1677-1685 : Ormonde)
publicationStmtPublisher: Printed by Benjamin Tooke ... and are to be sold by Mary Crook ...,
